roleset.name: make more intense

example.name: ergative
example.text: The hottest rivalry in the computer industry intensified sharply yesterday as Digital Equipment Corp. announced its first line of mainframe computers, targeting International Business Machines Corp.'s largest market.
example.arg: The hottest rivalry in the computer industry
as Digital Equipment Corp. announced its first line of mainframe computers, targeting International Business Machines Corp.'s largest market.

example.name: agentive
example.text: The collapse Friday prompted speculation that Ford would intensify its pursuit of Jaguar, which is negotiating a defensive alliance with GM.
example.arg: its pursuit of Jaguar, which is negotiating a defensive alliance with GM.

example.name: instrumental
example.text: Ford Motor Co. intensified its battle with General Motors Corp. over Jaguar PLC by saying it is prepared to make a bid for all of the British auto maker when restrictions on its shareholding are lifted.
example.arg: its battle with General Motors Corp. over Jaguar PLC
by saying it is prepared to make a bid for all of the British auto maker when restrictions on its shareholding are lifted.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Despite its intensification of diplomatic efforts, Azerbaijan is obliged to maintain its military strength.

roleset.note: INTENSIFY-V NOTES: It's possible this could take start/end points or EXT, but I doubt it. (from intensify.01-v)

roleset.name: extreme, rich, concentrated

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is intense (if in addition)

example.name: arg1
example.text: On the other hand , the standard of living of other countries ' peoples is rising , their education levels will rise , and anti-American passion also will not will not be so intense .

example.name: both args
example.text: The saffron lobster bisque broth was intense in flavor but let each aspect of the dish shine through!

roleset.note: INTENSE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to 'intensify'. (from intense.01-j)
